articles.author: Aaron Couch
articles.title: Tom Holland to Return to ‘Spider-Man’ Set Next Week After Injury - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The film will shut down for a week rather than attempt to shoot without the star.
articles.content:
Tom Holland will be taking a week off from the set of Spider-Man: Brand New Day after suffering an injury on set Friday.
Sony execs met on Monday to work out a plan to resume filming and determined … [+1275 chars]

articles.author: James Whitbrook
articles.title: Breaking Down the Creatures and Secrets of the First ‘Mandalorian and Grogu’ Trailer - Gizmodo
articles.description: Our first look at the next 'Star Wars' movie is light on story details, but filled with nods to the wider galaxy far, far away.
articles.content: This morning Lucasfilm and Disney released the first official trailer for The Mandalorian and Grogu, the long-awaited first Star Wars movie to hit theaters since 2019’s The Rise of Skywalker. Althoug… [+9281 chars]
